description:
Get your bottle from either side with this adjustable cage. Side-release bottle cages are great for when space is limited, like with a rear-suspension linkage, but they are often right-handed only, this cage can be adjusted for right or left hand release.

  • Lightweight injection molded composite
  • Supportive wings hold most bike bottles and other 78mm diameter bottles with ease
  • Sliding design allows for tool-free adjustment
name: 49N Dually-Side Entry Cage
